p.k: War, Art China (1987). Hrají: Gong Li, Liu Ji, Jiang Wen, Teng Rujun. Režie: Zhang Yimou.
p.d: In 1930s China a young woman is sent by her father to marry the leprous owner of a winery. In the nearby red sorghum fields she falls for one of his servants. When the master dies she finds herself inheriting the isolated business.
